item.title: 美联储会议召开前，S&P 500 指数买方介入，尽管宽幅震荡收窄
item.description: 过去一周，人们越来越担心市场广度的收窄会抑制 S&P 500 指数的迅猛涨势，但事实证明，在美联储做出利率决定之前，股票多头仍在抢购股票。【原文：While concern has grown in the past week that narrowing market breadth has tapped the brakes on the S&P 500 Index’s blistering rally, it turns out that stock bulls are still stepping in to snap up shares ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 军火亿万富翁与美国签订 22 亿美元协议，押注北约开支
item.description: 捷克斯洛伐克集团（Czechoslovak Group AS）表示，最近对美国几家弹药厂的收购将使其受益于全球国防开支的增长，同时它还在探索进一步的投资机会。【原文：Czechoslovak Group AS said the recent acquisition of several US ammunition plants would allow it to benefit from rising global defense spending while it explores further investment opportunities.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克警告称若乌克兰停止天然气输送将造成经济损失
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理敦促欧洲盟国在一项关键的过境协议于年底到期后，想办法让俄罗斯天然气继续流经乌克兰。【原文：Slovakia’s prime minister urged European allies to find a way to keep Russian gas flowing across Ukraine after a key transit deal expires at year’s end.】

item.title: 印度 Yotta Data 公司寻求 5 亿美元私人信贷以扩大规模
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度初创企业 Yotta Data Services Pvt.【原文：Indian start-up Yotta Data Services Pvt. Ltd. is seeking to raise about $500 million to invest in its data center parks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中东地区首次公开募股势头强劲，130 亿美元年后估值面临考验
item.description: 2024 年中东地区新股销售的大好势头有望在明年继续保持，尽管最近一些令人失望的首次交易已经对估值发出了警告信号。【原文：A bumper pace of new share sales across the Middle East in 2024 is expected to continue next year, even though a few recent disappointing trading debuts have flashed warning signs on valuations.】

item.title: 沃尔玛以 1998 年以来最佳业绩巩固零售业霸主地位
item.description: 在经济放缓的迹象下，美国消费者的应变能力受到质疑，而沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.这家全球最大的零售商以其折扣价格而闻名，但也越来越多地以其在广告和在线市场上的追求而著称。【原文：At a time when the American consumer’s resiliency has been questioned amid signs of a slowing economy, Walmart Inc. has thrived. The world’s largest retailer, famed for its discount prices but increasingly known for its pursuits in advertising and an online marketplace, is headed for its best year since 1998.】

item.title: 在量子技术飞跃的帮助下，Alphabet 的股票魔力又回来了
item.description: Alphabet 公司将在 2024 年结束时高歌猛进，量子计算的突破刺激了该公司股价在年末的上涨，尽管该公司近期并无商业潜力。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is ending 2024 on a high, with a quantum computing breakthrough spurring a late-year stock rally — despite having no near-term commercial potential.】

item.title: 德国对涉嫌滥用电力市场的调查将于 2025 年初结束
item.description: 德国联邦网络局表示，将于明年初结束对近期电价飙升涉嫌滥用市场行为的调查。【原文：Germany’s Federal Network Agency said it will conclude its investigation into alleged market abuse in connection with recent power price spikes early next year.】

item.title: CATL 致力于在订购基础上扩展电池交换网络
item.description: 中国当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.中国当代安培科技有限公司承诺将加大对电池交换解决方案的投资，包括电池组、订购计划和合作伙伴关系。【原文：China’s Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. pledged to invest more on battery swapping solutions that include battery packs, subscription plans, and partnerships.】

item.title: 莱恩称，欧洲央行必须在不确定的世界中保持灵活的降息政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行必须对降息步伐保持开放的心态，因为全球经济中挥之不去的风险仍可能改变通胀前景。【原文：The European Central Bank must keep an open mind about the pace of interest-rate cuts as lingering risks in the global economy could still shift the outlook for inflation, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 通胀前景依然黯淡，交易员押注英国央行缓慢减息
item.description: 周三的数据凸显了经济中潜在的通胀压力，交易员们坚持押注英国央行明年将逐步降低利率。【原文：Traders are sticking with bets that the Bank of England will reduce interest rates gradually next year, after data Wednesday highlighted underlying inflationary pressures in the economy.】

item.title: 日产最大股东雷诺表示对本田谈判持开放态度
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，雷诺汽车公司对日产汽车公司与本田汽车公司进行合并谈判持开放态度，因为这家法国汽车制造商正在设法使自己免受困扰其长期联盟伙伴的危机的影响。【原文：Renault SA is open to Nissan Motor Co. pursuing merger talks with Honda Motor Co. as the French automaker seeks way to insulate itself from the crisis plaguing its long-time alliance partner, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 德国电网运营商在返还率问题上败诉
item.description: 德国能源网络运营商为提高电网投资回报率而进行的法律诉讼在该国最高民事法庭败诉，法庭驳回了他们的质疑。【原文：Germany’s energy network operators lost their legal fight to increase returns on their grid investments at the country’s top civil court, which dismissed their challenges.】

item.title: Canyon Partners 首席信息官莱姆金将在二十年后离开公司
item.description: Canyon Partners 首席投资官托德-莱姆金（Todd Lemkin）将在二十多年后离开公司，为这家市值 260 亿美元的资产管理公司的一系列领导层变动画上句号。【原文：Canyon Partners Chief Investment Officer Todd Lemkin is leaving the firm after more than two decades, capping a series of leadership changes at the $26 billion asset manager.】

item.title: 叙利亚机场自阿萨德倒台以来首次重启航班
item.description: 叙利亚的主要机场在巴沙尔-阿萨德政权倒台后首次恢复运营，使这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家恢复了正常。【原文：Syria’s main airports resumed operations for the first time following the fall of Bashar Al Assad’s regime, bringing back an element of normalcy to the war-torn country.】

item.title: 日本经纪业游说团体称丑闻显示行业可能过于松懈
item.description: 代表日本经纪商的机构负责人警告野村控股公司和其他成员公司不要自满，称今年发生的一系列丑闻可能动摇公众对该行业的信心。【原文：The head of a body representing Japanese brokerages warned Nomura Holdings Inc. and other member companies against complacency, saying a slew of scandals this year could shake public confidence in the industry.】

item.title: 惠誉下调罗马尼亚信用展望并警告预算修正延期
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）表示可能会下调罗马尼亚的信用等级，理由是政治上的高度不确定性可能会推迟在明年重新举行总统选举之前削减欧盟最高预算赤字的计划。【原文：Fitch Ratings signaled it may cut Romania’s credit grade, citing high political uncertainty that’s likely to delay plans to reduce the European Union’s highest budget deficit ahead of a presidential election re-run next year.】

item.title: 英国风力发电量再创新高，天气警告依然有效
item.description: 周二，英国风力发电量创下新纪录，因为强劲的阵风促使英国部分地区发布了天气预警。【原文：UK wind power output reached a fresh record on Tuesday as strong gusts prompted weather warnings across parts of the country.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 将在掉期交易中发行 28 亿欧元债券
item.description: 瑞典 SBB 银行将出售 28 亿欧元（29.4 亿美元）的新票据，此前债券持有人同意兑换这家资金紧张的房东的现有证券。【原文：Sweden’s SBB will sell €2.8 billion ($2.94 billion) of new notes after bondholders agreed to exchange their existing securities in the cash-strapped landlord.】

item.title: 印尼维持关键利率以抑制卢比汇率下跌
item.description: 印尼央行连续第三个月维持关键利率不变，以支撑印尼盾跌破1美元兑16000印尼盾的关键支撑位。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for a third straight month to support the rupiah that fell past the key support level of 16,000 to the dollar.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克找到乌克兰天然气过境解决方案，欧洲天然气退缩
item.description: 欧洲天然气走低，原因是斯洛伐克推动燃料继续通过乌克兰供应，这使人们对该地区明年的天然气供应更加乐观。【原文：European natural gas edged lower as Slovakia’s push to keep the fuel coming through Ukraine adds optimism about the region’s supply next year.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行增持德国商业银行股份，Orcel 继续追击
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）将其在德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的持股比例增至约 28%，首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）加大了对这家德国贷款机构的收购力度。【原文：UniCredit SpA increased its holding in Commerzbank AG to about 28%, ratcheting up Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel’s pursuit of the German lender.】

item.title: 欧盟与南美的贸易协定为何终于有望达成？
item.description: 欧盟和南美国家花了超过四分之一个世纪的时间试图就自由贸易达成协议。今年，随着全球最大贸易伙伴美国和中国之间迫在眉睫的贸易战，谈判变得更加紧迫，这也促使其他地区寻求新的商业伙伴关系，以缓解贸易战带来的冲击。【原文：The European Union and South American nations have spent more than a quarter of a century trying to strike a deal on free trade. The negotiations took on new urgency this year as a looming trade war between the world’s biggest trading partners — the US and China — spurred other regions to seek out new commercial partnerships to soften the blow.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英国通胀跃升至八个月高点
item.description: 英国通胀率在 11 月份升至八个月来的新高，进一步高于英国央行 2% 的目标，支持了英国央行将在今年最后一次会议上维持利率不变的预期。【原文：UK inflation rose to an eight-month high in November, drifting further above the Bank of England’s 2% target and supporting expectations that it will hold interest rates at its final meeting of the year.】

item.title: 泰国维持关键利率不变，警告不确定性增加
item.description: 泰国央行在 10 月份意外降息后维持关键利率不变，并警告说未来的不确定性将会增加，因为央行正在抵制政府要求进一步放宽政策的呼吁。【原文：Thailand’s central bank left its key interest rate unchanged after a surprise cut in October, warning of rising future uncertainties as it resists government calls for further policy easing.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 11 月通胀率升至 2.6
韩国央行行长李明博预计戒严令动荡将损害经济增长
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）周三表示，韩国持续的政治动荡对经济造成了压力，暗示当局可能会下调经济增长预测，并采取稳定经济的应对措施。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said Wednesday that the ongoing political turmoil in South Korea weighs on the economy, suggesting authorities may downgrade growth forecasts and take stabilizing actions in response.】

item.title: 土耳其开始在索马里建造火箭发射设施
item.description: 非洲之角国家索马里的总统说，土耳其正在建造一个从索马里发射火箭的设施，这将推动安卡拉的远程火箭测试计划。【原文：Turkey is building a facility to launch rockets from Somalia, the Horn of Africa nation’s president said, boosting Ankara’s long-range rocket testing program.】

item.title: 中国监管机构要求保险公司报告万科债务持有情况
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国银行业监管机构要求中国最大的保险公司报告其对中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China’s banking regulator told the country’s biggest insurers to report their financial exposure to China Vanke Co., in a bid to assess how much support the developer needs to avoid default, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯达尔支持的可再生能源开发商酝酿在阿布扎比上市
item.description: Infinity Power 是马斯达尔公司（Masdar）部分控股的一家可再生能源开发商，据其董事长称，该公司正考虑在未来两三年内在阿布扎比证券交易所出售其股票。【原文：Infinity Power, a renewable energy developer partly owned by Masdar, is considering selling its shares on the Abu Dhabi stock exchange within the next two or three years, according to its chairman.】
